EmailTemplate.subject: You could save more with WEX Motorpass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear <insert customer name>,
Whether you’re cruising through the city or crossing the countryside, with a WEX Motorpass fuel card your business could save time and money. With acceptance at over 90% of service stations nationwide, you won’t have to go far to ﬁll up your tank, and you could save more thanks to our exclusive discounts and offers.
Apply today and receive 1 cent per litre off the pump price at any WEX Motorpass accepting service station.*
As a special limited offer, if you make the move to WEX Motorpass you’ll also receive the following: • Reduced monthly card fee of $3.95 per card, per month (excl. GST) • No out of network fees • $50 joining fee waived
To take up this special offer, simply call me on <insert number> between 8:45am and 5:00pm AEST/AEDST before <insert offer end date>.
From Woolloomooloo to Wallan, anywhere you are, I look forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
*This offer is available to new customers only and cannot be used in conjunction with any other offer. The offer applies to each card issued under your WEX Motorpass account. The 1 cent discount applies to all fuel purchases, with no additional discounts on non-fuel spend. The WEX Motorpass account must be paid within WEX Australia’s credit terms or WEX will, at its discretion cease to apply the discount. In the event that the WEX Motorpass account is cancelled, either by the cardholder or by WEX Australia, the discount cannot be transferred to another account or exchanged for cash. Applicants and authorised representatives must be over 18 years, have an ABN and use their vehicle for business purposes to apply. The standard WEX Motorpass terms and conditions and fees and charges apply. Please see motorpass.com.au/terms-and-conditions. Credit is issued by WEX Australia Pty Ltd ABN 68 005 970 570 and applications are subject to credit assessment criteria. ™ Motorpass and Anywhere you are,are registered trademarks of WEX Australia Pty Ltd ABN 68 005 970 570.
